questions.question: Which data type is NOT primitive in JavaScript?
Explain the concept of closures in JavaScript.
questions.answer: Closures are functions that refer to independent variables. In other words, the function defined in the closure 'remembers' the environment in which it was created.

questions.question: Select the image that correctly represents a binary tree.
Which framework is primarily used for front-end web development?
Briefly explain what 'Polymorphism' means in Object-Oriented Programming.
questions.answer: Polymorphism in Object-Oriented Programming refers to the ability of a function or method to perform in different ways based on the object it is acting upon, meaning the same function or method can have different behaviors for different objects.
